_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Steel Division 2
author: f.falk@pm.me
description: Steel Division 2 is thrilling in single-player mode with its new dynamic campaign system, and also offers an extensive multiplayer mode where up to 20 players can compete against each other simultaneously.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# TS3 Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

apk add wget bash jq curl openssl

# Download server files, only available in docker unfortunately
# Docker-in-docker requires special setup to work, so this is a bit of a workaround
# https://stackoverflow.com/questions/37905763/how-do-i-download-docker-images-without-using-the-pull-command
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moby/moby/master/contrib/download-frozen-image-v2.sh
chmod +x download-frozen-image-v2.sh
mkdir 'img'
./download-frozen-image-v2.sh 'img' eugensystems/steeldivision2:latest
mkdir 'img-files'
find -type f -name layer.tar -exec tar -zxf {} --directory 'img-files' \;
cp 'img-files/server/steeldiv2-server' /mnt/server

# Generate pkey/cert
openssl genrsa -out /mnt/server/pkey 2048
openssl req -new -batch -key /mnt/server/pkey -out /mnt/server/cert.req
openssl x509 -req -days 365 -in /mnt/server/cert.req -signkey /mnt/server/pkey -out /mnt/server/cert

# Generate config files
# Comments copied from https://eugensystems.com/downloads/wargame3_server.tar.bz2
cat <<EOF > /mnt/server/params_for_ai.json
{
    "0": [
        {
            "name": "Deck name in the lobby",
            "deckContent": "JSGssa0xrjGvEa4BrkGuUa3xrGKtAq2RrWGvQq6CrnGr4a7hrSGu0a6RrzGtUa3RrmKt4azhrJGsIaxRrKGsAavxrUE=",
            "iaLevel": 1
        }
    ],
    "1": [
        {
            "name": "Deck name in the lobby",
            "deckContent": "Gx6Bgbehg4GDsYFxgsGD8YJBghGA4YSRhKG8YYMhgMGDAoNyhCGE0YRSg5GBoYJhgTGCsYKhgxGFMoKShVI=",
            "iaLevel": 2
        }
    ]
}
EOF
cat <<EOF > /mnt/server/install.txt
SteelDiv2 Dedicated Server is provided "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES
OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

To install dedicated server, please follow these steps :
- Edit login.ini file and insert your login and the dedicated key that eugen must have provided
- Edit variables.ini and configure the games options
- Launch steeldiv2-server with command line : ./steeldiv2-server +port XXXX +ip_mms 178.32.126.73 +port_mms 10002 +ip YY.YY.YY.YY
where your must replace XXXX by a valid port > 10000 and YY.YY.YY.YY by the IP of your server.

Enjoy !


Optional steps :
- You can use rcon protocol to kick/ban people, change server properties at runtime.
You can active rcon by specify the option +rcon_password and +rcon_port when you start your server.
You should then be able to connect using rcon client. Available commands are :
display_all_clients                         -> Display the list of connected clients with their Id
kick CLIENT_ID                              -> Kick the client with Id CLIENT_ID
kick CLIENT_PSEUDO                          -> Kick the client with pseudo CLIENT_PSEUDO (CLIENT_PSEUDO can be a part of his real pseudo)
ban CLIENT_ID DELAY_IN_HOUR                 -> Ban the player with Id CLIENT_ID for DELAY_IN_HOUR hours
ban CLIENT_PSEUDO DELAY_IN_HOUR             -> Ban the player with pseudo CLIENT_PSEUDO for DELAY_IN_HOUR hours (CLIENT_PSEUDO can be a part of his real pseudo)
unban CLIENT_ID                             -> Unban the player with Id CLIENT_ID
setsvar VARIABLE_NAME VARIABLE_VALUE        -> Allow you to change one of the settings of the server (have a look at variables.ini)

- You can have a look at the admins.ini file to add some admins to your server
EOF

cat <<EOF > /mnt/server/banned_clients.ini
; This file contains the list of the banned user
; Its lines should be like :
; 120487=1373993738
; where 120487 is the client Id of the banned player and 1373993738 is the end date of the ban stored using Unix time (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unix_time)
; If the end date is 0, it means that the player is banned forever
EOF

cat <<EOF > /mnt/server/admins.ini
; This file contains the list of the admins
;
; Its lines should be like :
; 120487="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz"
; where 120487 is the client Id of the admin player and abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz is the rights granted to this players
;
; Granted rights can be :
;   s -> Can change serveur variable 
;   p -> Can change player variable
;   k -> Can kick clients
;   b -> Can ban clients  
;   u -> Can unban clients
;
; Admins can execute these commands ingame if they are connected on the server.
;
; Available commands are :
; kick CLIENT_ID                              -> Kick the client with Id CLIENT_ID
; kick CLIENT_PSEUDO                          -> Kick the client with pseudo CLIENT_PSEUDO (CLIENT_PSEUDO can be a part of his real pseudo)
; ban CLIENT_ID DELAY_IN_HOUR                 -> Ban the player with Id CLIENT_ID for DELAY_IN_HOUR hours
; ban CLIENT_PSEUDO DELAY_IN_HOUR             -> Ban the player with pseudo CLIENT_PSEUDO for DELAY_IN_HOUR hours (CLIENT_PSEUDO can be a part of his real pseudo)
; unban CLIENT_ID                             -> Unban the player with Id CLIENT_ID
; setsvar VARIABLE_NAME VARIABLE_VALUE        -> Allow you to change one of the settings of the server (have a look at variables.ini)
;
; To execute a command, admin must enter in the lobby chat : "/COMMAND"
; For example, to kick player with pseudo toto, he must enter /kick toto
;
EOF

cat <<EOF > /mnt/server/login.ini
; This file contains the parameters needed to register your server in the servers list
; You need to have a valid eugnet account and a dedicated key. 
; If you have no dedicated key, ask a key at : eugsupport@eugen.fr (please provide your login in the mail).
;

login="INSERT_YOUR_LOGIN"
dedicated_key="INSERT_YOUR_KEY_HERE"
EOF

cat <<EOF > /mnt/server/variables.ini
; This file contains the parameters of the room
; Allowed key / values are :
;
; NbMaxPlayer : Specify how many players can play during a game
;   Allowed values : NbMaxPlayer <= 20, default value is 20
;
; ServerName : Specify the name of the server
;   Allowed values : Text, default value is "Default Server Name"
;
; GameType : Specify the mode opposition mode.
;   Allowed values : 0 (ALLIES vs AXIS), 1 (ALLIES vs ALLIES), 2 (AXIS vs AXIS), default value is 0
;
; InitMoney : Specify the amount of money which will be shared between players
;   Allowed values : All, default value is 750
;
; TimeLimit : Specify the time of the fight in seconds
;   Allowed values : All, 0 means unlimited, default value is 1200
;
; ScoreLimit : Specify the score to reach to win
;   Allowed values : All, default value is 4000
;
; VictoryCond : Specify the victory condition
;   Allowed values : 1 (Destruction), 2 (Siege), 3 (Economy), 4 (Conquest), default value is 1
;
; NbMinPlayer: Specify the number of players needed to start the countdown
;   Allowed values : NbMinPlayer < 20 and NbMinPlayer < NbMaxPlayer, default value is 10
;
; WarmupCountdown : Specify the time in seconds before launch the game when NbMinPlayers is reached
;   Allowed values : WarmupCountdown > 10, default value is 120
;
; LoadingTimeMax : Specify the time max in seconds between the end of the countdown and the beginning of the deployment
;   Allowed values : LoadingTimeMax > 60, default value is 120
;
; DeploiementTimeMax : Specify the time in seconds before deployment end
;   Allowed values : DeploiementTimeMax > 10, default value is 120
;
; DebriefingTimeMax : Specify the time max in seconds of the debriefing, players have DebriefingTimeMax seconds to click on the "Next Game" button if they want to stay on the server
;   Allowed values : All values, default value is 30
;
; DeltaMaxTeamSize : Specify the delta max of players between the 2 teams
;   Allowed values : All values, default value is 10
;
; MaxTeamSize : Specify the size max of the teams
;   Allowed values : All values, default value is 10
;
; IncomeRate : Specify the income rate
;   Allowed values : 0 (None), 1 (Very low), 2 (Low), 3 (Normal), 4 (High), 5 (VeryHigh), default value is 3
;
; PhaseADuration :  Duration of the first gameplay phase.
;   Allowed values : Any
;
; PhaseBDuration : Duration of the second gameplay phase.
;   Allowed values : Any
;
; DivisionTagFilter : Force players to restrict themselves to some deck types. If unspecified, it allows them any deck.
;   Allowed values : <unspecified>, East, West
;
; AllowObservers : Allow observer type players to join and watch the game
;   Allowed values : 0 (Don't allow), 1 (Allow), 2 (Low), 3 (Normal), default value is 1
;
; ObserverDelay : Observers see a delayed version of the game to minimise cheating
;   Allowed values : any, default value is 120
;
; CoopVsAI : Mode where all players are on one side and computer players fill in the other team
;   Allowed values : 0 (Disabled), 1 (Players are forced in the first team), 2 (Players are forced in the second team), default value is 0
;
; AutoFillAI: Allows the server to spawn computer player to fill in any missing player slot when the game launches. 
;   This isn't compatible with CoopVsAI mode.
;   Allowed values : 0 (Disabled), 1 (Enabled)
;
; DeltaTimeCheckAutoFillAI: Delay between each computer player joining the server to fill in the missing slots.
;   Allowed values : any, default value is 60
;
;
; ### Map Selection ###
;
; Each map is available in multiple variants, of size or game setting rules. Not all settings are possible though. Refer to the map list table for more details on that.
; 
; For example, let's say we want to use the Bobr map. We can see in the table that the map base id is _2x2_Urban_River_Bobr_LD_1v1. Also, 
; the map is more meant for 1v1 so it's rather small. And it can only do Conquest, Breakthrough and Close Quarter modes.
; 
; We'll pick the Breakthrough mode. This means we need to add the suffix _BKT to the map base id. With that, we now have all the information we need to configure the server. 
; We'll just use that configuration block in variables.ini:
;     Map = _2x2_Urban_River_Bobr_LD_1v1_BKT
;     VictoryCond = 5
;     CombatRule = 2
;
; +----------------------------+----------------+--------------+------------+
; |           Mode             | Map id suffix  | VictoryCond  | CombatRule |
; +----------------------------+----------------+--------------+------------+
; | Conquest                   |                |           2  |          2 |
; | Breakthrough               | BKT            |           5  |          2 |
; | Close Quarter              | CQC            |           3  |          2 |
; | Destruction                | DEST           |           2  |          1 |
; | Destruction Close Quarter  | DEST_CQC       |           3  |          1 |
; +----------------------------+----------------+--------------+------------+
;
; Conquest doesn't have a suffix at all so the id to use is just the value you can find in the map table bellow. For Bobr it would just be _2x2_Urban_River_Bobr_LD_1v1 then.
;
; Map : Specify the Id of the map
;   Allowed values (uses Map Base Id):
;           +-----------------------+---------------------------------------+-----------+---------------+----------------+--------------+---------------------------+
;           |         Name          |             Map Base Id               | Conquest  | Breakthrough  | Close Quarter  | Destruction  | Destruction Close Quarter |
;           +-----------------------+---------------------------------------+-----------+---------------+----------------+--------------+---------------------------+
;           | Orsha, north          | _2x1_Proto_levelBuild_Orsha_N_LD_1v1  | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              | ✔            | ✔                         |
;           | Tsel                  | _2x2_Foret_Tsel_LD_1v1                | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Sianno                | _2x2_Lacs_Sianno_LD_1v1               | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              | ✔            | ✔                         |
;           | Lenina                | _2x2_Lenina_LD_1v1                    | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Ostrowno              | _2x2_Ostrowno_LD_1v1                  | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              | ✔            | ✔                         |
;           | Orsha, east           | _2x2_Plateau_Central_Orsha_E_LD_1v1   | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Krupa                 | _2x2_River_Swamp_Krupa_LD_1v1         | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Shchedrin             | _2x2_Shchedrin_LD_1v1                 | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Slutsk, east          | _2x2_Slutsk_E_LD_1v1                  | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Slutsk                | _2x2_Slutsk_LD_1v1                    | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Slutsk, west          | _2x2_Slutsk_W_LD_1v1                  | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Bobr                  | _2x2_Urban_River_Bobr_LD_1v1          | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Haroshaje             | _2x2_Ville_Centrale_Haroshaje_LD_1v1  | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Novka                 | _3x2_Astrouna_Novka_LD_2v2            | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Beshankovichy         | _3x2_Beshankovichy_LD_2v2             | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Smolyany              | _3x2_Bridges_Smolyany_LD_3v3          | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Vitebsk, east         | _3x2_East_Vitebsk_LD_2v2              | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              | ✔            | ✔                         |
;           | Autobahn zur Hälle    | _3x2_Highway_LD                       | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Ilomantsi             | _3x2_Ilomantsi_LD_1v1                 | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Ilomantsi             | _3x2_Ilomantsi_LD_2v2                 | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Losnica               | _3x2_Island_Losnica_LD_2v2            | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Lenina                | _3x2_Lenina_LD_2v2                    | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Lenina                | _3x2_Lenina_LD_3v3                    | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Lipen                 | _3x2_Lipen_LD_3v3                     | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Lyakhavichy           | _3x2_Lyakhavichy_LD_3v3               | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              | ✔            | ✔                         |
;           | Naratch lake          | _3x2_Marecages_Naratch_lake_LD_3v3    | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Mogilev #10vs10       | _3x2_Mogilev_LD_10v10                 | ✔         |               |                |              |                           |
;           | Mogilev               | _3x2_Mogilev_LD_3v3                   | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Ostrowno              | _3x2_Ostrowno_LD_2v2                  | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Ostrowno              | _3x2_Ostrowno_LD_3v3                  | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Pleshchenitsy, south  | _3x2_Rivers_Pleshchenitsy_S_LD_3v3    | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Shchedrin             | _3x2_Shchedrin_LD_2v2                 | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              | ✔            | ✔                         |
;           | Shchedrin             | _3x2_Shchedrin_LD_3v3                 | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Siedlce               | _3x2_Siedlce_LD_1v1                   | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Siedlce               | _3x2_Siedlce_LD_2v2                   | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Slutsk                | _3x2_Slutsk_LD_2v2                    | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Slutsk                | _3x2_Slutsk_LD_3v3                    | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Tali Ihantala         | _3x2_Tali_Ihantala_LD_1v1             | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Tali Ihantala         | _3x2_Tali_Ihantala_LD_2v2             | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Tali Ihantala         | _3x2_Tali_Ihantala_LD_3v3             | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Krupki #10vs10        | _3x2_Urban_roads_Krupki_LD_10v10      | ✔         |               |                |              |                           |
;           | Krupki                | _3x2_Urban_roads_Krupki_LD_3v3        | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Veselovo              | _3x2_Veselovo_LD_2v2                  | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Bobrujsk, west        | _3x2_West_Bobrujsk_LD_2v2             | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              | ✔            | ✔                         |
;           | Brest, west           | _3x2_West_Brest_LD_1v1                | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Brest, west           | _3x2_West_Brest_LD_2v2                | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Brest, west           | _3x2_West_Brest_LD_3v3                | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              | ✔            | ✔                         |
;           | Zbuczyn               | _3x2_Zbuczyn_LD_1v1                   | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Zbuczyn               | _3x2_Zbuczyn_LD_2v2                   | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Lenina                | _4x2_Lenina_LD_4v4                    | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Ostrowno              | _4x2_Ostrowno_LD_4v4                  | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Shchedrin             | _4x2_Shchedrin_LD_4v4                 | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Slutsk DEST #10vs10   | _4x2_Slutsk_LD_10v10                  |           |               |                | ✔            | ✔                         |
;           | Slutsk                | _4x2_Slutsk_LD_4v4                    | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              | ✔            | ✔                         |
;           | Gora Kalwaria         | _4x2_Vistula_Gora_Kalwaria_LD_1v1     | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              |              |                           |
;           | Gora Kalwaria         | _4x2_Vistula_Gora_Kalwaria_LD_4v4     | ✔         | ✔             | ✔              | ✔            | ✔                         |
;           | Tannenberg            | _4x2_tannenberg_10vs10                | ✔         |               |                |              |                           |
;           +-----------------------+---------------------------------------+-----------+---------------+----------------+--------------+---------------------------+
;
; MapRotationType : Specify the deck date constraint
;   Since VictoryCond and CombatRule is set outside of the map list, you cannot have a server that cycles between different game modes as a technical limitation.
;   Allowed values : 0 (None), 1 (Simple rotation), 2 (Random)
;
; InverseSpawnPoints : Swaps starting points between the two teams
;   Allowed values : 0 (Default), 1 (Swapped)
;

ServerName = "Default Server Name"
NbMaxPlayer = 20
GameType = 0
Map = _2x2_Urban_River_Bobr_LD_1v1_BKT
VictoryCond = 5
CombatRule = 2
InitMoney = 10000
ScoreLimit = 20000
NbMinPlayer = 18
DebriefingTimeMax = 180
DeploiementTimeMax = 120
WarmupCountdown = 15
TimeLimit = 3600
DeltaMaxTeamSize = 10
MaxTeamSize = 10
EOF

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: The server name shown in matchmaking

variables.name: Login
variables.description: Username provided to Eugen when requesting an API key

variables.name: API Key
variables.description: API Key provided by Eugen. Send an email to "eugsupport@eugen.fr" containing your EugNet login, E-Mail used to register, and Steel Division 2 CD key to receive one.

variables.name: RCon Password
variables.description: Password used to connect to server RCon

variables.name: RCon port
variables.description: Port used to connect to server RCon

variables.name: Matchmaking server IP address
variables.description: IP Address to Eugen Matchmaking server

variables.name: Matchmaking server port
variables.description: Port used to connect to Eugen Matchmaking server
